title: Assoc. Athletics Dir., Marketing & Promotions - College Sports
text: Make Your Passion Your Career. â„¢ Work In Sports. Region Map Here is the job that interests you: Assoc. Athletics Dir., Marketing & Promotions College Sports Posted/Updated: 10-16-2015 Brief Job Description: Responsible for managing and directing all marketing efforts to maximize awareness, revenues and attendance for the athletic program.   Since your site launched in 2000, WorkInSports.com has been the go to place for USA Baseball when we are looking to fill full-time openings and internships. Your reputation throughout the sports industry as a vital tool for job seekers and employers is well deserved. Thanks again! David Perkins
